website_summaries.verdict: The Expeditor Active AQ Tech delivers a glove-like fit right off the bat and immense comfort. On top of all that, those who choose to own this ultra-lightweight offering from Berghaus have the privilege of experiencing the trail with top-notch waterproofing and surface traction. The only thing that might deter buyers from getting one is its towering price tag. Nevertheless, the Berghaus Expeditor Active AQ Tech overflows with so much merit that owning one despite being quite expensive doesn’t sound such a bad idea.
pros: A great multitude of wearers gave the Berghaus Expeditor Active AQ Tech top marks in the comfort category
Its relentless water protection impressed droves of reviewers, including professional ones
According to numerous reports, this Berghaus hiking gear runs true to size
The shoe was praised by many owners for its unbelievable lightness
Some users found the Expeditor Active AQ Tech highly durable
This hiker floored several patrons with its astonishingly grippy Opti-Stud outsole
About a handful of customers raved about the footgear’s amazing support system
An expert applauded the footwear’s stylish design
The Expeditor Active AQ Tech’s quick break-in period stumped a couple of testers
cons: A few purchasers considered the shoe’s grand asking price an unfortunate letdown

customer_reviews.title: Get normal size!
customer_reviews.text: With lots of walking shoes/boots it’s advised that you go up half a size to allow for your feet swelling after walking for a long time. I am a 10 and got a 10.5. Didn’t feel right. Exchanged for 10. These are my summer walkers so thin socks and staying cool is the way ahead. Out of the box they are fab and feel broken in. Very comfortable and all round excellent shoe. Love them. I did go half a size up in the Hillmaster GTX2 boots but might get a 10 next time. Well made and recommend
customer_reviews.author: Graham W

customer_reviews.title: Excellent allrounder
customer_reviews.text: I wanted some walking shoes to replace some worn out Karrimors. Thought I would pay a bit more and try a higher quality name. I didn't want anything with a Vibram sole as I find them too hard and consequently dangerously slippy in certain situations. The expeditors fit straight out of the box, super comfortable and extremely well put together. They are not the current fashion which is a bit loud and brash, but discreet and unobtrusive which suits me. The soles are very well treaded and made of soft enough rubber to actually grip, they are also firm enough to walk over broken ground while are just as happy on tarmac. Overall an excellent walking shoe....highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Captain Kirk

customer_reviews.title: Narrow shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Already owning a pair of Berghaus boots I thought these would be a good decision. I was disappointed straight out of the box. They did not feel the same quality as my boots at all but the main issue was although I ordered the same size as my boots (which are a nice fit) they are quite narrow. I doubt I could wear a thick pair of socks and remain comfortable on a walk. The lenght of the shoe was ok I take a size 9 and had just about enough toe room. I have returned them for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: wj

customer_reviews.title: Incredible Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have been using a pair of Berghaus boots for a couple of years, (they still look good) I need it a pair of shoes for my work where involves a lot of walking so I just tried them out from the box and I couldn't believe how comfortable are this hiking shoes considering they are brand new. I use them for few hours they have good grip, very light and flexible. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Axel

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and good buy
customer_reviews.text: Already had a pair this time last year in Black Friday. Remember to order a size 0.5 larger and you won't be disappointed. Very comfortable and quite light. Ordered another pair on Black Friday only to find that Amazon one week later had dropped the price by another £35. But give them their due, rather than me sending straight back the pair I had and claiming a refund and then reordering at the lower price they immediately refunded the difference. One of the big advantages of buying from Amazon direct ... hail Jeff Bezos for great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: A. Roden

customer_reviews.title: AWD for Feet
customer_reviews.text: I already had Berghaus boots which were brilliant. I bought these to replace a cheaper high street brand on which, while the uppers & bottoms of the soles were in very good nick, had very quickly lost all semblance of comfort. No such worries with these. You can feel the difference in quality as soon as you put them on! Excellent!
customer_reviews.author: MR_Wales

customer_reviews.title: Loose fit not too keen
customer_reviews.text: They are a loose fit maybe a size too big I can't decide. It's a problem with purchasing shoes on the internet. As someone mentioned putting in an inner sole make them fit better. I'm a UK size 8 and they look and feel like a size 9. I suppose if you were wearing very thick socks they would be a better fit? I can literally put two fingers down the back, they are that loose with the laces tied, and wearing moderately thick socks.
customer_reviews.author: stewjw

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable from the start
customer_reviews.text: Excellent walking shoes and really comfortable. I really researched walking shoes and tried on many brands however Bergaus were for me the most comfortable and didn't need bedding in as many do. I have wide feet and it is becoming more difficult to find a wide fit shoe without going for a bigger size and that means your feet slide forward when walking downhill and cause problems with your toes. Time will tell how they fair for longevity but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Vennwood

customer_reviews.title: Best walking trainer I've owned
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Waterproof for my early morning dog walks here in Orkney. Comfortable and lightweight for such sturdy footwear. Would definitely recommend and I will buy again if I should ever need to. Worth the slightly higher price to get proper quality
customer_reviews.author: Huskyaddict

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, tried out first using Prime Wardrobe
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable! I’m usually a size 10 but had to go a half size up. 10.5 fits perfectly and these shoes are good to go straight from the box - no breaking in required. Have done me well so far this summer - beach, family walks, 3 days at Legoland Billund (wallet aches, feet fine). Waterproof, light weight, non slip sole - very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: J. R. Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Good support
customer_reviews.text: These boots offer fantastic support and are comfortable from the first time of wearing, although I still put them through their paces ahead of a long hike to avoid problems. The laces are a little slippery and needed to be double knotted but that is a minor issue. Overall, these feel great on the feet, are lightweight but supportive, very comfortable and are even good for driving.
customer_reviews.author: Dolphin

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The quality looks great, I can’t see why they won’t last for ages. Very comfortable and feel like I’ve had them for ages. I have wide feet and I’m a small 9, large 8.5 and they fit with room for big socks without feeling like they are too big with regular socks - perfect for me but if you have narrow feet they might be classed as loose fitting. Very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: john_p

customer_reviews.title: I like these shoes
customer_reviews.text: An update, It's been raining the past few days and again I am walking dogs on wet grass and my feet are wet. These are £90 walking shoes they should keep my feet dry as advertised. Look like I have another pait of shoes to return. I just bought my second pair of these, since the last ones were so good I bought another pair. I've only had them a few week and I've been walking the dogs on wet grass, I thought my feet were slightly damp and when I took my shoes off my socks were wet. Hopefully the replacement shoes will be as good as my first.
customer_reviews.author: caroline@bythesea99.freeserve.co.uk

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes for walking
customer_reviews.text: These are comfortable and easy to walk with. They aren't very smart as the suede look and the grey dull make them look worn. But at the reduced price they are a steal. I do quite a bit of walking when I'm on holiday so likeb comfortable shoes which are supportive. These do that very well even over rough ground.
customer_reviews.author: A structural engineer

customer_reviews.title: Good uppers, terrible soles
customer_reviews.text: Arrived and first worn 10/01/20 first impressions very comfortable, nice looking dark brown uppers. Didn’t take any wearing in, excellent on all surfaces and totally waterproof. I’ve used them mainly for walking the dog and everyday works to work. Less than 6 months later the uppers are like new, still waterproof but the heel sole is shot. Completely worn through and useless apart from knocking around in the garden. For this reason I can’t recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Craner

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Very good build quality, has lasted very well so far, it’s ware resistance is good for rain and wet grass (not prolonged usage in such conditions though). The only disappointing thing is that the shoe laces they come with are quite annoying because they untying quite easily and no matter how much I tying them hard they won’t stay that way for long.
customer_reviews.author: W0lfy

customer_reviews.title: A Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: only had them for a week, but worn all day for various gardening work. lovely fit, very comfortable, and appear to be fully waterproof. usually buy waterproof boots for work. They tend to last between 3 months!! (expensive ones) and 12 months ( cheap, from Screwfix. 'Site' I think, good sturdy boot, waterproof,but not particularly comfortable). Be interesting to see how long these last.
customer_reviews.author: gary walding

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and waterproof
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I use them to walk the dog around a muddy field, they have good grip and are very comfortable to walk in from the first use. They also keep my feet dry when it is raining. All in all a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Soady

customer_reviews.title: Incredible light and compact, super comfortable and stylish.
customer_reviews.text: I use hiking shoes for more than 20 years and by far, this one is the best one of them all. It's incredibly light if compared to previous models and it's also very comfortable, since the first wear. I liked it so much that when I need a new pair of hiking boots I'll check if they have a boot in a similar model.
customer_reviews.author: NELSON ESQUIVEL

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable from the word go.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these in a size 8 and while they are very comforamtable from the word go I think they are a little bit on the large side but nothing that a decent pair of walking socks doesn't fix. Haven't had chance to test the waterproof capabilities as yet and I guess only time will tell as to how durable they are. I seem to wear out a pair of shoes or boots with or without a Vibram sole in abiout 300-350 miles which for me is every three months or so. Hoping these will last a bit longer.
customer_reviews.author: Karl Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Noisy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought another pair of Berghaus walking shoes as the last ones have lasted for years!! Lovely and comfortable when I tried them on at home, but ...... once I wore them to go walking, the left shoe started to make a loud noise with every step - like a clunk sound, so I sound like a ticking clock as I walk! Right shoe is fine. Have decided to keep them as I can't be bothered with the hastle of sending them back but not sure if I'd buy Berghaus again. As with most things these days, paying a premium does not guarantee premium quality :-(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic, comfortable, waterproof walking shoes
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these shoes at the last minute, prior to a visit to the Norwegian Fjords, and I'm so pleased I did. For gentle hikes up to glaciers and walking around towns and villages (often in heavy rain), they were perfect. For intensive hikes, boots would be more suitable, but they were ideal for my requirements. I'm always nervous of buying shoes online without being able to try them on first, but these Expeditor's were a perfect fit. They are very comfortable, I think they look good (predominantly black and grey, with touches of red and blue), and they are most definitely waterproof! Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: DLB71

customer_reviews.title: The most comfortable walking shoes I've owned
customer_reviews.text: Usual super-efficient Amazon delivery. Much cheaper than the high street (about £25 less). So, comfortable too....don't rub anywhere, easy to break-in...well, there isnt a need to break in. Look smart and have a lifetime guarantee. Cannot ask for more than that!
customer_reviews.author: edwan

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and fit.
customer_reviews.text: We bought these walking shoes as I already have Berghaus walking boots and my husband has not had Berghaus shoes before. He is extremely pleased with the fit and comfort of the shoes and I know they will wear exceptionally well from my experience.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes....
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly. .well made product. Comfy and fits well. Good for hillwalking and also for wearing shopping in town . I wore them in the Cairngorms so they definitely do the job .I have berghaus boots for autumn and winter . The shoes I use for spring and summer ...
customer_reviews.author: John Mel

customer_reviews.title: Rubs heels
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been buying Berghaus footwear for years and never had any problems until now. This pair rub the backs of my heels, which obviously makes them unsuitable as a walking shoe. Disappointing for the money.
customer_reviews.author: he132305

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and waterproof but the sole is poor
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very lightweight and fully waterproof but I do not find them comfortable to walk in. The heel area of the sole is too firm and it does not provide great support to the mid-foot, causing me to get plantar fasciitis in one foot. The size is a little on the small side as well.
customer_reviews.author: R. Miles

customer_reviews.title: Good pair of walking shoes
customer_reviews.text: Took these up to Lake District with me and did a lot of walking including climbing up mountains and stepping through streams. These performed admirably and were very comfortable and didn’t let any water in. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: john b

customer_reviews.title: Super comfort.
customer_reviews.text: Quality shoe from a quality brand. Very comfortable indeed. Have walked in these at pace for some distance and no issues whatsoever. Longevity unknown at present but berghaus have a good reputation.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Gillings

customer_reviews.title: Good value and stylish walking shoes
customer_reviews.text: I bought these after reading some positive reviews. They're a stylish shoe which I use for walking: mainly road/lane with occasional muddy footpath. So far they remain waterproof. I hope I can add another star if I remember to report back after further use.
customer_reviews.author: MRG

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes,  as always.
customer_reviews.text: I usually buy Berghaus as they always fit me straight out of the box. These were no exception. Nice and light though really sturdy, they proved themselves on some craggy rocks during our hikes around Menorca.
customer_reviews.author: Penman Writer

customer_reviews.title: Love these, very comfy
customer_reviews.text: I got these for walking around the trails with my dog. They're incredibly comfortable for my 7.5 feet. They feel sturdy but also soft and cushioned. They're great.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Trebell

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Bought the shoes (size 9.5) at a really good price. Really like the colour & design and they are very comfortable... I liked them so much that I bought a second pair....
customer_reviews.author: M.U.

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable, very happy.
customer_reviews.text: These are extremely well made and super comfortable so I'm very happy. It's what you expect from a large manufacturer like Berghaus and they don't disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Colin JONES

customer_reviews.title: Sadly, not fit for purpose
customer_reviews.text: At first, I really liked them. The fit was perfect and they looked smart. However, after 6 months the inside heel wore through, to some harsh material that did a number on my heels ie horrendous blisters. I expect far more from this brand than to pay a lot for hiking shoes that are useless within 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: andrew robinson

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Smart, comfortable, and fit like a glove. I get gout but do a lot of hiking so the right shoes are essential. These are just as good as Berghaus' boots but easier for everyday use and light hiking. Basically can't be faulted.
customer_reviews.author: Simon

customer_reviews.title: Great walking shoes👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and extremely comfortable straight out the box! Great for walking on all terrain when it’s too warm/dry for boots!
customer_reviews.author: I, Maidenhead

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of shoes
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable walking shoes - In fact the most comfortable pair of walking shoes I have ever owned - they are waterproof and study without being restrictive - very tempted to buy a second pair
customer_reviews.author: Duds

customer_reviews.title: Weather proof trainers
customer_reviews.text: Excellent wind and rain proof trainers. Stylish and comfortable. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Riley

customer_reviews.title: Quality walking shoe
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight , comfortable and sturdy enough for summer use in the Scottish hills. I've never been disappointed by a Berghaus product yet !
customer_reviews.author: iain russell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit and ultra comfortable shoes
customer_reviews.text: There are very comfortable shoes. I ordered one size bigger initially but i had to return as my correct size uk 7 fits perfectly. The only problem I had was the laces which does not stay laced after half a mile walk. I have to purchase after market laces to get the full comfort of the shoes, otherwise perfect shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Shridhar Charan Sahoo

customer_reviews.title: Well made, comfortable and great price
customer_reviews.text: Really pleased with them so far though haven’t tested the weatherproofing as yet. They look to be very well made indeed and are very comfortable not requiring any breaking in and were at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: FGB

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and well fitting shoe
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit with half size available. Appear well made and very comfortable to wear - I hope they last bit very pleased at the moment
customer_reviews.author: Microlighter

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable straight out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Pretty decent but a fraction large, I'm not convinced that the right one is slightly longer than the left one....
customer_reviews.author: holmes

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes ever.
customer_reviews.text: I wear these everyday for work, they are by far the most comfortable shoes I own. I need to buy another pair before they stop making them.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Husband loves them, great shoe especially since the dog chewed through last pair!
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: I have a pair of berghaus hiking boots which are excellent, so when it came to getting a pair of walking shoes there was no contest, berghaus again for me. They were ordered 3 days ago for my birthday and they arrived Sunday evening, that is some service.
customer_reviews.author: mapping hack

customer_reviews.title: Fit
customer_reviews.text: These replaced another pair of Berghaus shoes which have given brilliant service.Ordered same size as last ones but slightly bigger but still OK
customer_reviews.author: MR A G PALMER

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: These walking shoes are very good. No problems doing a 10 mile hike over different terrain.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Rogers

customer_reviews.title: The best walking shoe I have ever purchased. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: The most comfortable walking shoe I have ever purchased. Waterproof, lightweight and great for day to day wear, urban walking or getting out in the countryside. Unlike many other outdoor boots, these are lightweight and perfect for driving in. In fact they were so good that I bought a pair for my Dad for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bought for a friend of mine who does not have ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a friend of mine who does not have a computer. He received thwm earlier than expected and were exactly what he wanted..
customer_reviews.author: Captain Birdseye

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Within an hour they were fitting like slippers. Very comfortable and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Driftwood

customer_reviews.title: Great walking shoes
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery was brilliant ! Shoe seems comfortable and well made
customer_reviews.author: chris g

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes for a good price
customer_reviews.text: They were a little tight for the first day or so, however they fit great now. Not much to say about the quality - exactly what you expect from Berghaus - great.
customer_reviews.author: K Thrower

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: really really good. very comfortable out of the box and since. good grip and certainly splash proof. Berghaus are real good at these.
customer_reviews.author: Nanoboy

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes, these are the 2nd pair I have bought.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy Swales

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Comfy well made shoes at a reasonable price. What's not to like about that?
customer_reviews.author: Finlay C. Macaulay

customer_reviews.title: So comfy and worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the money for the quality of the shoe love berghaus make
customer_reviews.author: Kyle brindle

customer_reviews.title: Excellent deal
customer_reviews.text: Great quality at a very good price. I paid £72.50. The discount chain Go Outdoors wanted £95. The manufacturers website lists them at £90!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. M. Woodward

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Smart, waterproof, easy to clean. Just a little narrower than my previous Meindl walking shoes but fine after wearing in for a few weeks
customer_reviews.author: stephen gazzard

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is comfortable, supportive when walking, fits very well, though more obviously sturdy than many trainer styles. I am very pleased with the shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Wilkinson

customer_reviews.title: Strong boots that will last.
customer_reviews.text: It's a perfect fit and is sturdy enough for everyday use.
customer_reviews.author: David McCormack

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Can't beat these for the price, had to drop down half a size as they on the large side.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Berghaus sizes
customer_reviews.text: Tight fit even with light walking socks but firm tread support for rough ground.Exchanging for half size larger.
customer_reviews.author: anthony rybicki

customer_reviews.title: Buy half a size up
customer_reviews.text: Ordered size 10 they feel a little snug will probably feel better once bedded in. Suggest buying half a size up. Shoes are well made and have good grip.
customer_reviews.author: AndrewP

customer_reviews.title: Best for hiking
customer_reviews.text: Best hiking shoes at this price range. Out of the box ready for hike, doesn’t feel like new to feet with super comfort.
customer_reviews.author: SS

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable but. .
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable but tread worn through in 11 months light use.
customer_reviews.author: J W.

customer_reviews.title: Completely waterproof and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: They become part of you when worn, being very comfortable with a good grip. Replaced a very worn much loved 20 year old pair of trainers.
customer_reviews.author: DHSM

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: I've worn Berghaus boots for years without a single issues. These are my first pair of Berghaus shoes & although its early days, they are every bit as comfortable, so I can't see my satifisfaction being any less than my opinion of the boots
customer_reviews.author: Archfluke

customer_reviews.title: Being comfy shoe I am a boot person
customer_reviews.text: My first pair walking shoe have done several long walks very comfy in rain too dry feet they are as good as there boots berghaus good brand no breaking in needed
customer_reviews.author: PJS

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to dislike - fitted perfectly and comfortable. They are waterproof too. No hesitation in recommending them and a good price too.
customer_reviews.author: Rob W

customer_reviews.title: Buy this product
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit.and very comfortable.will buy again.its worth spending a bit more money and getting quality.
customer_reviews.author: Markant

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: A solid outdoor shoe at a considerably lower price than the Gore-Tex lined Fellmaster that they replaced. A good fit & actually more comfortable than the Fellmaster, for me at least.
customer_reviews.author: Mudge the Otter

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Bought for monster 184 mile walk in 6 days. Very happy with them during my training period. Comfy and solid.
customer_reviews.author: P. B. Blanchard

customer_reviews.title: Top value.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are excellent, very comfortable and a perfect fit
customer_reviews.author: Eric Brown

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoes and posted in time so happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Adrian White

customer_reviews.title: Great walking shoes
customer_reviews.text: Far superior to the Mieli that they replaced. Very comfortable and perfect fit. Too early to rate durability. Good grip in wet conditions.
customer_reviews.author: ajc

customer_reviews.title: Easy buying process
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were marginally too narrow for me initially, I went 1/2 a size up and they fit perfectly. The process of swapping the smaller pair for the larger was extremely quick and easy.
customer_reviews.author: A customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son walks well in these shoes. Stable but light.
customer_reviews.author: Lewist

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Fit
customer_reviews.text: Really comfortable to wear straight out of the box. Size 9 fits perfect for me
customer_reviews.author: Mr C Nickerson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shoes
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, comfy and completely water-proof. Brilliant value and perfect fit for me
customer_reviews.author: paul

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality as you would expect from Berghaus, and shoes are completely waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Carl G

customer_reviews.title: They fit nicely, are very comfortable and breathe in the warm ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and well packaged. They fit nicely, are very comfortable and breathe in the warm weather. Time will tell on how hard wearing they are but I don't see it being an issue as I've had quite a few Berghaus products without any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Davy

customer_reviews.title: Accurate Sizing
customer_reviews.text: Delivery faster than expected, really good quality, comfortable, my size is 11UK, bought size 11, perfect fit
customer_reviews.author: Carpe Diem

customer_reviews.title: Good product and delivery.
customer_reviews.text: These are very good comfortable shoes at a good price. Delivery was speedy. I am pleased with the transaction .
customer_reviews.author: J. L. Macdonald

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe so far a little early for a full review but fits well and comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Kevh

customer_reviews.title: Nice and close fit
customer_reviews.text: Nice and close fit, but still easy to take off without untying the laces. The laces keeps tied relatively well, so you don't have to retie them constantly. As someone who usually buys size 44, size 9 1/2 of this shoe fitted perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really good shoes. Comfortable. Very waterproof. Walked on the shore with waves lapping and they stayed dry.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: Like the colour and the style,a good fit and comfortable. Worn them walking in the Lake district kept feet dry. Very good value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Ian W

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: good quality and also look good - no issues with these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Ra

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: its the best i have had on my feet in years
customer_reviews.author: john still

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortbale
customer_reviews.text: I normally suffer with blisters from any new show / boot - but no problem at all with these boots.
customer_reviews.author: GMS

customer_reviews.title: too large
customer_reviews.text: Way bigger than any other shoes i have in the same size. Confirmed as to why I rarely buy shoes online.
customer_reviews.author: Aidan

customer_reviews.title: Not what i expected!
customer_reviews.text: Quality was okay but gave me anckle pain, had to return
customer_reviews.author: Tsering Dorjee

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for less than £50
customer_reviews.text: Great product, excellent price and quality for the price paid
customer_reviews.author: Allison Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable practical and good value
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Used them a lot in this first week for walks and general getting about
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have previously worn similar Berghaus product and wasn't disappointed, this fits as expected and feels like I ...
customer_reviews.text: I have previously worn similar Berghaus product and wasn't disappointed, this fits as expected and feels like I can expect similar longevity.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: support and comfort fantastic
customer_reviews.text: my husband has really sore feet and these shoes are the only shoes that help support his feet for comfort
customer_reviews.author: Jess Telford

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe, took half size up and they fit lke gloves.

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of shoes
customer_reviews.text: Never been disappointed with Berghaus. Very comfortable for all sorts of outdoor activities.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny L.

product_meta.title: Berghaus Men's Expeditor Active AQ Tech Shoes
product_meta.description: As rugged and waterproof as our hiking boots yet as lightweight and flexible as a trainer, the Expeditor Active is perfectly designed to take you anywhere.
